name: mastermind-game
description: A classic single-player Mastermind game implemented in TypeScript for the web

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try{fs.copyFileSync('src/index.html','dist/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('src/styles.css','dist/styles.css'); fs.copyFileSync('src/game.js','dist/game.js')} catch(e){console.log('Assets copied or not needed')}"
